lexUnit.name: warning.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a message that informs someone of a potential danger.

sentence.text: Early Thursday , Daoud repeated the interim government 's warning to insurgents and the residents of Fallouja that a joint U. S. -Iraqi attack was imminent unless the city rid itself of guerrillas and handed over Zarqawi .
